item.title: Blockchain Investments Equaled Half of All 2015 Fintech VC Funding
item.description:
Blockchain Investments Equaled Half of All 2015 Fintech VC Funding

An interesting shift is taking place in the world of Fintech funding right now. Even though the total amount of VC funding in Fintech is slowing down, the money flowing to blockchain companies continues to grow. Newer areas of financial technology are always a great source of innovation.

item.title: LEOcoin: Currency for the World of Business Technology
item.description:
LEOcoin: Currency for the World of Business Technology

LEOcoin is a relatively new digital currency that operates on a blockchain-based, peer-to-peer network. Entering a market saturated with altcoins, this project will have to set itself apart from the crowd if it wants to avoid getting drowned out by all the altcoin noise. Disclaimer: This article was sponsored by LEOcoin.

item.title: Financial Experts Disappointed As Fed Fails To Raise Interest Rates
item.description:
Financial Experts Disappointed As Fed Fails To Raise Interest Rates

Failing to increase interest rates means a big deal to stock market investors. With little interest to be gained in "safe investments" more aggressive measures will be warranted.

item.title: Baidu's Move to Ban Bitcoin Related Ads from Its Network Raises Speculations - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Baidu's Move to Ban Bitcoin Related Ads from Its Network Raises Speculations - NEWSBTC

The Chinese search engine giant and Google's rival, Baidu has suddenly decided to suspend all cryptocurrency related advertisements on its platform. Read more... READ MORE: Baidu Stops Accepting Bitcoin Payments Baidu, the Chinese search engine giant has enforced a blanket ban on all digital currency-related advertisements.

item.title: Let's Talk Bitcoin! #306 - Bitcoin Vaults and Selective Reversibility as a Virtue
item.description:
Let's Talk Bitcoin! #306 - Bitcoin Vaults and Selective Reversibility as a Virtue

Andreas, Stephanie and Adam are joined by Emin GÃ¼n Sirer of HackingDistributed.com to discuss Bitcoin Security, Covenants and fixing the bitcoin theft problem by creating reversible on-chain vaults. Content for episode 306 was provided by Andreas, Stephanie, Gun and Adam. This episode was edited by Adam B.

item.title: Atlanta's Blockchain Enthusiasts Take an In-Depth Look at Dash
item.description:
Atlanta's Blockchain Enthusiasts Take an In-Depth Look at Dash

At the most recent Blockchain Atlanta gathering, attendees were treated to an in-depth presentation on Dash by founder and lead developer Evan Duffield, and myself - Amanda B. Johnson - host of DASH: Detailed.

item.description:
I'm out * /r/btc

Bitcoin has simply become too toxic for me. It isn't just this sub, or Bitcointalk, or Twitter - it's obvious that this toxicity has pervaded the...

item.title: ACI's Roger Oliphant: "Open Blockchain Standards Are Too Slow"
item.description:
ACI's Roger Oliphant: "Open Blockchain Standards Are Too Slow"

Oliphant claims the same applies to other open blockchain standards, all of which take too long to confirm transactions. Ever since corporations garnered an interest in the blockchain, the topic of scalability has been kicked around a fair few times. A new report by Gartner indicates the technology has hit the "peak of inflated expectations">.

item.title: 'Yours Network' to Use Bitcoin in Competition Against Steemit
item.description:
'Yours Network' to Use Bitcoin in Competition Against Steemit

With all the hype surrounding decentralized, blockchain-based social media platforms such as Steemit and Synereo, another next-gen network is on the horizon. Also read: Is Facebook About to Get 'Myspaced' by Next-Gen Social Media? Back in April, the lead developers of the "Yours Network," Ryan X.
